    Package Description
    ca.utoronto.utm.othello.model  

    • Uses of OthelloController in ca.utoronto.utm.othello.model

      Subclasses of OthelloController in ca.utoronto.utm.othello.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OthelloControllerBetterVSHuman
      This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P2 to play the computer P1.
      class  OthelloControllerGreedyVSHuman
      This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P2 to play the computer P1.
      class  OthelloControllerHumanVSBetter
      This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2.
      class  OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy
      This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2.
      class  OthelloControllerHumanVSHuman
      Run the main from this class to play two humans against eachother.
      class  OthelloControllerHumanVSRandom
      This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2.
      class  OthelloControllerRandomVSGreedy
      The goal here is to print out the probability that Random wins and Greedy wins as a result of playing 10000 games against each other with P1=Random and P2=Greedy.
      class  OthelloControllerRandomVSHuman
      This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P2 to play the computer P1.
      class  OthelloControllerRandomVSRandom
      Determine whether the first player or second player has the advantage when both are playing a Random Strategy.
      class  OthelloControllerVerbose
